title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment) order 2021

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment with effect 
from 1 May 2021.
text_norm: 2 fiach kelly particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment effect 1 may 2021

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 3. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment with effect 
from 1 May 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 July, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [377] 3
